Description: Certify your proficiency in automating workflows and accelerating development with GitHub Actions. Test your skills in streamlining workflows, automating tasks, and optimizing software pipelines, including CI/CD—all within customizable workflows. Once achieved, the certification will be valid for two years.
Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazil), Korean, Japanese

Once achieved, the certification will be valid for two years.

Description: Highlight your code security knowledge with the GitHub Advanced Security certification. Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazil), Korean, Japanese

Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazil), Korean, Japanese

Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese (Brazil), Korean, Japanese
